name: Tickets, Please! (tvorojok, kamennsq)
description:
Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 47 Game Jam Theme: Stuck In A loop.

When I was young, I used to watch the stars all night long.
Their beautiful light beckoned me every single night.
My dreams have been connected with space since I remember.

Up to the old age, I haven't lost my hope to see other worlds inhabited by unique creatures.
And one dark night in the sky I saw..
..A train
It stopped close to me.

I quickly entered the carriage through the opened doors and saw many different creatures!
Since that, a lot of time has passed. I have visited lots of worlds.
But only here, in train, I feel happy.
I'm stuck in here like in a loop and I'm so glad.

This train is all my life!

20+ Characters, 9 Stations, 6 Different Backgrounds and 999999 possible outcomes of the ticket number :)

Credits:

Art, Design: Sam (@Tvorojok) https://www.instagram.com/downscarf/ https://twitter.com/DownScarf1 

Programming: Boris (@kamennsq) https://twitter.com/VoiceOfKepler

and You For Playing!

Enjoy!
